items.name: coderabbit-types
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit Types
items.description: Pure TypeScript types for CodeRabbit API integration. Framework-agnostic type definitions with zero dependencies.

items.name: coderabbit-client
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit API Client
items.description: Framework-agnostic CodeRabbit API client. Works in Node.js, Deno, Bun, Edge runtimes, and browsers. Single endpoint for generating developer activity reports with 10-minute timeout support.
items.docs: Set CODERABBIT_API_KEY environment variable or pass apiKey in config. Get API key from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan subscription).

items.name: coderabbit-storage-adapter
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit Storage Adapter Interface
items.description: TypeScript interface for implementing custom storage backends. Implement this to add support for any database.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-localstorage
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit LocalStorage Adapter
items.description: Browser localStorage adapter for CodeRabbit reports. Perfect for client-side apps and prototyping. No database required.
items.docs: Browser-only storage using localStorage. Data persists across sessions but is limited to ~5-10MB.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-convex
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit Convex Adapter
items.description: Convex database adapter with real-time sync and auth support. Includes schema definitions for the reports table.
items.docs: Import coderabbitReportsTable in your convex/schema.ts and add as 'coderabbit_reports' table. Pass ConvexReactClient instance and api to ConvexStorageAdapter constructor.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-supabase
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit Supabase Adapter
items.description: Supabase (PostgreSQL) adapter with Row Level Security support. Includes SQL schema and RLS policies.
items.docs: Create a Supabase client and pass to SupabaseStorageAdapter. Run the SQL schema from the adapter file to create the coderabbit_reports table with RLS policies.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-postgres
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit PostgreSQL Adapter
items.description: PostgreSQL adapter with connection pooling. Works with Neon, Vercel Postgres, Railway, AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, etc.
items.docs: Create a PostgreSQL connection pool and pass to PostgresStorageAdapter. Run the SQL schema from the adapter file to create the coderabbit_reports table.

items.name: coderabbit-storage-mysql
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit MySQL Adapter
items.description: MySQL/MariaDB adapter with connection pooling. Works with PlanetScale, AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, Azure, etc.
items.docs: Create a MySQL connection pool and pass to MySQLStorageAdapter. Run the SQL schema from the adapter file to create the coderabbit_reports table.

items.name: coderabbit-actions
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit Server Actions
items.description: Next.js server actions for CodeRabbit API. Handles API calls server-side where CODERABBIT_API_KEY is securely available.
items.docs: Import and use checkCodeRabbitConfig() and generateReportAction() in your client components. The API key is read server-side from CODERABBIT_API_KEY env var.

items.name: coderabbit-react
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit React Hook
items.description: React hook for generating CodeRabbit reports with built-in loading and error states. Uses server actions by default for secure API key handling in Next.js.

items.name: coderabbit-form
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit Report Form
items.description: Full-featured form component for collecting report parameters. Includes template selection, custom prompts, filters, and grouping options.

items.name: coderabbit-branding
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit Branding
items.description: CodeRabbit logo and icon components with dark/light theme support. Includes SVG assets.

items.name: coderabbit-localstorage
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit with LocalStorage
items.description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with browser localStorage. Perfect for prototyping and client-side apps. No database required.

items.name: coderabbit-convex
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit with Convex
items.description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with Convex database. Includes real-time sync, auth support, and schema definitions. Perfect for production apps.
items.docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Run 'npx convex dev' to get your Convex deployment URL. Import coderabbitReportsTable in your convex/schema.ts.

items.name: coderabbit-supabase
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit with Supabase
items.description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with Supabase (PostgreSQL). Includes Row Level Security policies. Perfect for apps with authentication.
items.docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Run the SQL schema from storage-supabase.ts.

items.name: coderabbit-postgres
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit with PostgreSQL
items.description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with PostgreSQL. Works with Neon, Vercel Postgres, Railway, AWS RDS, etc.
items.docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Run the SQL schema from storage-postgres.ts.

items.name: coderabbit-mysql
items.author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
items.title: CodeRabbit with MySQL
items.description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with MySQL/MariaDB. Works with PlanetScale, AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, Azure, etc.
items.docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Run the SQL schema from storage-mysql.ts.
